description: Send notification when operational status of the input changes
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::stateChanged PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtAlarmID i 6 PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtSensorType i 1 PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtName s EXAMPLE PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtDescription s EXAMPLE PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtAlarmStatus i 2 PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtAlarmSeverity i 3

$SNMPTRAPCMD PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::stateChanged PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtAlarmID i 6 PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtSensorType i 1 PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtName s EXAMPLE PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtDescription s EXAMPLE PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtAlarmStatus i 1 PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtAlarmSeverity i 1

description: External and internal alarm index uniquely identifies this row.
T-Metro 200 ES platform has four dry-contacts sensor inputs.
T5C-XG platform has four dry-contact sensor inputs and two dry-contact sensor outputs.
An integer with supported range of values 1-6 for T5C-XG and 1-4 for T-Metro 200 ES. Index. Not-accessible
variables.name: PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtAlarmID

description: Sensor type. An enumeration with two values: input(1), output(2).
T-Metro 200 ES platform has four dry-contacts sensor inputs.
T5C-XG platform has four dry-contact sensor inputs and two dry-contact sensor outputs.
variables.name: PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtSensorType

description: Name of alarm. An OCTET-STRING with max. 16 OCTETS.
variables.name: PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtName

description: Alarm description. An OCTET-STRING with max. 64 OCTETS.
variables.name: PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtDescription

description: Alarm status. An enumeration with two values: no-alarm(1), alarm(2).
variables.name: PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtAlarmStatus

description: Configured alarm severity. An enumeration with 4 values:
variables.name: PRVT-DRY-CONTACTS-MIB::prvtAlarmSeverity
